statements: UPDATE fuel_consumption SET fuel_quantity = 100 WHERE aircraft_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET distance_traveled = 500.5, fuel_type = 'Jet A' WHERE aircraft_id = 2 AND date = '2022-02-15';
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET fuel_quantity = fuel_quantity + 100 WHERE aircraft_id = 123 AND date = '2022-10-05';
UPDATE fuel_consumption SET distance_traveled = distance_traveled - 50 WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND fuel_type = 'Jet Fuel';
UPDATE Aircraft SET registration='N12345', model='Boeing 777' WHERE aircraft_id=1;
